page.title: 05PUCKPOOL PARK
page.content: { Puckpool Park}is a self-contained{ {leisure park.}It has a variety of amenities, including a{children's play {area,}a{cafeteria}and{adult games {areas.}These consist of tennis courts, crazy golf, a golf course and a bowling green. The children's play area has a slide, swings, swingboat, roundabout and see-saw. The park is surrounded by a variety of trees and shrubs, attractively arranged. Within the park is an {aquarium,}housing a large selection of tropical fish, and an{aviary}where budgerigars and parrots are kept. There are{public toilets}at the entrance to the park. Entrance is free, but the{car park}costs 20p. The park appeals to young and old alike.
